ygData.subject: Re: Level 20-30 solo?
ygData.msgSnippet: Good point.  A good place with few aggro mobs for probably 20 - 25 is East Karana, near either the entrance to the gorge, or the road to hph.  You can kill
ygData.messageBody:
Good point. A good place with few aggro mobs for probably 20 - 25 is East
Karana, near either the entrance to the gorge, or the road to hph. You can
kill gorge hounds, and if you get one or 2 others, crag spiders which are
great exp. My 22 ranger gets a bubble from less than 10 crags (soloing with
snare/archery, takes a LOT of arrows). They are usually about lvl 20 or 21.

Just stay away from the griffawns, even the ones that con green. They'll
tear you up quick with double attack that hits for 40's.

Ryugen
Bertoxxulous


>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Level 20-30 solo?
>Date: Wed, 15 Sep 1999 15:14:18 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
>I can solo blues fairly easily. However, I need to find a place that
>has a good spawn rate of them, close to a general merchant, and some
>place that isn't overly camped. I could stay in the oasis and solo
>blues easily. But it is way overcamped to be good.
>
>Personally, I think trying to solo in a dungeon is not the right way to
>go about it. You should instead find a place with non aggs or aggs spread
>out enough that you can pick one off safely and safely kill it without
>worrying about all the other creatures roaming about.
>
>
> >
> > From: Jeffrey Sue <jsue@...>
> >
> > I know this is gonna sound sarcastic with no tone being able to be
>conveyed,
> > but try not to look at it this way. The game was designed for groups.
>Once
> > you hit a certain level (different for different classes) it's just
>almost
> > impossible
> > to solo. I know for my bard, he sucked at soloing from about 20-25 in
>unrest,
> > but now at 27 i am able to solo blues again, thanks to fear song and
>chains
> > song. (This is the part that will sound nasty, but i really don't mean
>it
> > that way)
> > If you only have 10 or 15 minutes I would suggest just playing some
>other
> > non eq game of which there are many good ones.
> >
> >
> >
> > At 02:24 PM 9/15/1999 -0400, you wrote:
> > >From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
> > >
> > >Hi everyone, I'm new to the list, but my monk has hit level 20, and
> > >has decided he has killed enough crocodiles. I'm looking for some
> > >place that I could solo from level 20-30 and maybe a place that even
> > >gives good monk loot.
> > >
> > >Also, what kind of armor should I be looking for? I'm pretty much
> > >straight mesh and LJ tunic.
> > >
